mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart SET user_seq=#{userSeq}, product_seq=#{productSeq}, product_qty=#{productQty}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_seq, p.id, p.product_name, c.product_qty, p.product_price, (c.product_qty * p.product_price) total_price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_seq=p.id JOIN user u ON c.user_seq=u.id WHERE c.user_seq=#{userSeq} ORDER BY c.id
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.product_qty * p.product_price), 0) FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_seq=p.id WHERE c.user_seq=#{userSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE id=#{id} AND user_seq=#{userSeq}
DELETE FROM cart WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq} AND product_seq=#{productSeq}
